name: key-sync
description: Tiny VSCode Extension Synchronize **only** keybinding configuration.

commands.title: Key Sync: Save keyboard shortcuts to keybindings.son in the local repository
Key Sync: Load keybindings.json from the local repository into keyboard shortcuts

Key Sync: Open the cheat sheet (README.md)

key-sync.GitBranch.description: Specifies an existing git branch. Example: `main`, `master`, `windows`, `linux`
